alert.note: Alert for Tolland; Windham (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 12 at 3:35PM EDT until March 15 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches possible. * WHERE...Portions of northern Connecticut, central, and northeastern Massachusetts and northern Rhode Island. * WHEN...From Monday evening through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Heavy wet snow combined with gusty winds could bring down tree branches and result in power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain is expected to change to snow early Tuesday morning, then beginning to accumulate later Tuesday morning into Tuesday night. The late day Tuesday commute will likely be impacted with snow covered roads and low visibility. Snowfall and impacts may vary greatly with elevation.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
